channel.title: HELP! will ++REP!
channel.description:
Alright guise my client.jar works when I run it on my computer (everything connects fine etc etc) but when i upload it as a webclient it doesn't connect, any idea? do i need to set it weirdly so it connects to my ip?
here's my code for my forums.
<center> <HEAD> <TITLE>Homicide Pkz</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="Homicide Pkz" width="765" height="503" archive="<client.jar link i uploaded onto fileden>" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet> </center>
DOES NOT UNDERSTAND WHY IT DOESN'T CONNECT.
Base = CreativeScape

item.title: HELP! will ++REP!
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

try fileave.com

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! will ++REP!
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

[code]

Homicide Pkz [/code]

Okay dude upload your client.jar to your website, and upload the CACHE only to fileden.
You want your HTML to be like this:

[code]

Homicide Pkz [/code]

Read full topic
